forecast_days.description: Cloudy with sunny periods and isolated showers.

data.conditions: 6 AMPssst. Hey. Wakey, wakey! We've got a welcome little change in the air for your Wednesday. Early morning sunshine will yield to encroaching cloud cover before midday, so come quick and you may catch a couple rays. But, even if you miss 'em, stick around. Because before too long, some cool frosty flakes should be coming down. High temperatures will top out near 20 at the summit and in the upper 20s down in the Village. Winds should remain on the light side, breezing out of the west in the 5-15 mph range. Head for the slopes without fear or hesitation. Because the time has come to get a little zesty with the forces of gravitation, as a sacrificial offering to the atmosphere for an extra hefty powder application. - Lege

forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly before 1am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 1. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Mostly sunny, with a high near 13. Calm wind becoming west around 6 mph in the afternoon.

forecast.day_comments: Snow.  High near 35. South southwest wind around 6 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow.  Low around 32. Wind chill values between 24 and 29. South southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
